title: MNF Preview: Patriots-Jets Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 11/9)
description:
You can always make a bad game interesting with a little gambling and that's exactly what Will Brinson and Mike McClure provide on this episode. The guys break down Patriots vs. Jets from a betting perspective, focusing on game picks, player props and DFS advice. Sure, Sam Darnold is out, but Mike is still looking to bet New York if the spread gets to a certain number. Over reception props will be another target of his tonight. Lastly, we get advice from a truly seasoned DFS pro with tips for tonight's game and showdown building in general.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Mike5754
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
